content.title: Mino - Personal finance app
content.description: Did you know that in Argentina, the first month of 2022, Red Link registered a record 43.7 million of digital money users and an increase of 87.7% in the nominal amount of transactions through digital wallets compared to January of the previous year? These transformations makes money an easy resource to manage, which in turn makes it tend to diversify. That is why I created Mino, a free application where centralizing funds from digital wallets, bank accounts and cryptocurrencies is a simple task, with which, in less than 10 minutes, users can have a clear view of their financial status without delays and stressful counts.

content.title: EcoTech - Promotional site
content.description: I present EcoTech, a venture located in San Luis (Argentina), which proposed us the challenge of finding a way to approach potential customers interested in its products and services. Our solution: develop a website that conveys security and trust, user friendly, and the visual appeal they deserve; with a series of calls to action whose userflow ends with the contact of our client.
